bio: Founder-minded Product Designer with a unique background: elite special operations, fine arts, and AI-powered product building. I build systems that turn raw ambition into structured, usable products - whether AI workspaces, or startups. Blending grit, creativity, and strategy, I translate complex challenges into designs that actually drive growth.

achievements.text: Building Rujum AI, an AI-native orchestration platform that turns raw ambition into structured, fully AI-provisioned workspaces.
Designed system logic for AI agents to plan, execute, and validate complex workflows.
Shaped the user journey from a single prompt to a usable workspace—making AI feel like a co-founder, not a tool.
Built a barter economy app (barter-lah!) while unable to apply for a work permit in Singapore—co-designed with ChatGPT v3 (before it was mainstream).
Exchanged PT sessions for workspace, mentorship (YC alum, ex-Uber), and even Formula 1 tickets.
Co-founded and grew a Web3 gaming startup, securing $500K in funding.
Directed product design, player experience, and go-to-market strategy.
Navigated multiple pivots before external geopolitical factors [7/10] forced closure—building resilience through adversity.
Created handmade physical collectibles and digital design projects—maintaining creativity between ventures.
Led cross-campus security at Hebrew University, managing 50+ staff and coordinating emergency responses.
Delivered pre-military training programs on resilience and performance under pressure.
Managed event production logistics for expos, exhibitions, and sporting events.
Co-founded a new operational unit within Shayetet 13, designing its mission, training, and systems from the ground up.
Led operations and product development in Unit 81, from requirements to deployment in the field.
Advanced from standard units to tier-1 special forces, completing multiple elite training programs.

details.text: Completed a 4-month intensive program in startup building, venture design, and go-to-market strategy.
Capstone: prototyped Rujum AI, an AI-powered orchestration platform.
Specialized in animation and visual storytelling, building a strong foundation in narrative and design.
